As a Royal Marines Officer you'll...

...Be responsible for some of the most highly trained men in the world, leading them and keeping them focused, fit and ready for anything.

...Fight alongside your men, relying on your training to bring out the best in them under the most extreme pressures.

...Share your men's highs and lows, building the trust and teamwork that's essential to the Royal Marines' effectiveness as a fighting force.
